snippet: Government advisers recommended that the F.D.A. approve the weight-loss drug lorcaserin.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration advisory committee recommends approval of lorcaserin, a weight-loss drug developed by Arena Pharmaceuticals, making it likely that a new obesity treatment will reach the market by the end of the year; approval of drug would make lorcaserin the first new prescription diet pill to be sold in 13 years; another obesity medication, Qnexa, was endorsed by the same committee in February.
lead_paragraph: Government advisers recommended that the F.D.A. approve the weight-loss drug lorcaserin.

headline.seo: Diet Drug Wins Approval of F.D.A. Advisers
